General.Name: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited manufactures and exports frozen vegetables in Thailand and internationally. It offers soybeans, green beans, sweet corn, baby corn, carrots, and mixed vegetables. The company offers its products under the Eda, BENAS, and Cornista brands. In addition, it manufactures and distributes fresh fruits, frozen fruits, and freeze-dried fruits and foods. Chiangmai Frozen Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
